headline: TEAMSTERS AT SYSCO PORTLAND AUTHORIZE STRIKE
summary: Teamsters at Sysco Portland have voted by a 99.5 percent margin to authorize a strike if the multibillion-dollar company fails to present an acceptable contract offer. More than 270 drivers, mechanics, and warehouse workers are demanding an agreement with wages, benefits, and working conditions that match the strong gains other Teamsters at Sysco have won nationwide.

headline: Unstoppable Together: Craveworthy Brands Launches Crave University and Awards $20,000 Scholarships at First-Ever CraveCon
summary: Craveworthy Brands ("Craveworthy,") the multi-brand restaurant platform redefining hospitality, launched Crave University and awarded $20,000 in scholarships at its first-ever company conference, CraveCon 2025. The initiative reflects Craveworthy's people-first values and commitment to creating opportunities that go far beyond the four walls of a restaurant.

thumbnail.caption: The Company honored 30 incredible success stories from across its brands this past year, including “Operator of The Year,” Carmen Balbi.

headline: Sysco’s Presents Southern Smoke Festival 2025 in Ongoing Commitment to Community and Customers
summary: Join over 85 top chefs at delicious Houston charity event aimed at raising funds to help our food & beverage community overcome crisesHOUSTON, Oct. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Sysco Corporation, the leading global foodservice distribution company, is honored to present Southern Smoke Festival 2025, representing our deep commitment to community and customers.
